channel.title: Personal on Ramesh's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Ramesh's Blog

item.title: Why I Got Into Computer Programming
item.description: This dates back to when I was in high school around start of my 10th grade. I got access to internet for the first time in my life 1. Up until this point, my only interactions with a computer was purely as a device for gaming. I used to spend a disproportionate of time playing games 2. I made an account on facebook and played the games on it cause it was all the rage at the time.

item.title: Georgia Tech's OMSCS Program
item.description: OMSCS is Georgia Tech’s Online Master’s Program in Computer Science. It is run fully online, generally taken up by working professionals. I enrolled into the program in Fall Semester (September - December) of 2018 thus completing one semester at the time of writing. Before I considered OMSCS I originally intended to apply to on-campus programs in the US, but I ended up skipping out multiple times First when my peers applied right out of their undergraduate program When my co-workers applied first year into their career and when they applied second year into their career Each time I kept thinking “I’m not going to procrastinate this year and apply”.

item.title: First Post
item.description: Why even blog? So then, this is probably going to be a pretty boring intro to what I’m trying to get at by blogging. I spend a lot time on the internet, it’s actually more surprising when I don’t find myself on it. I’m easily distracted when I’m trying to be productive and have a hard time trying to focus. There are specific things I’d like to achieve by blogging
